title.rendered: Hardik Pandya vs Ben Stokes: Former cricketers make their comparisons

content.rendered:
India’s star all-rounder Hardik Pandya and England’s Ben Stokes have come to view as the biggest match winners for their respective sides in the shortest format of the game. Comparisons between the two have been rife ever since Pandya’s batting gained greater heights after the IPL win, Asia Cup 2002, and the England tour.

Former South Africa allrounder Lance Klusener said that Hardik Pandya’s batting is improving by the game but is yet to reach the zenith and is still not the full product. Pointing out that Stokes is a more complete player than Pandya, the current Zimbabwean coach added that Pandya is learning all the time.

I think Stokes is a little bit more complete than a guy like Pandya. But he’s learning all the time,

Lance Klusener

Klusener was quoted as saying by a leading English daily.

Read also:New Zealand Launches New Jersey for T20 World Cup 2022
